about_the_game:
The fan-favorite romcom visual novel Mashiroiro Symphony is back, and it’s better than ever!

REMAKE FEATURES


◆ NEW HD graphics! Featuring 1920x1080 resolution—that’s full HD!
◆ NEW revamped UI! Smooth as butter—get straight to the story!

STORY


Kagamidai is a blend of two towns, old and new.
Each has colorful scenery and colorful people... but it’s as if the two are painted in completely different colors.

Shingo Uryu is a normal young man from the new side of town, but the academy that he attends is about to be integrated with a venerable edifice of the town’s older side—the prestigious Yuihime Girls Private Academy.
Thrust into a combined class to help test the upcoming merge’s effects, Shingo begins commuting to Yuihime... and his life starts to change.

CHARACTER


Airi Sena
Voice: Nazuna Gogyo
Birthday: October 24th / Blood Type: A / Height: 158 cm / Measurements: B82/W57/H85 / Favorite Food: Steamed Potatoes

Quick-witted, beautiful, and the principal’s daughter, Sena’s dignified manner makes her popular with those around her—but underneath, she’s actually stubborn, vain, and a slave to her emotions. When it comes to Shingo in particular, she’s also a practitioner of tough love.


Sakuno Uryu
Voice: Oto Agumi
Birthday: January 23rd / Blood Type: AB / Height: 162 cm / Measurements: B80/W54/H80 / Favorite Food: Her brother’s home cooking

Shingo’s stepsister, Sakuno is a skilled cook and in charge of the household’s dinner table. Being taller than usual for a girl, she has developed a bit of a complex about her height.


Angelina Nanatsu Seawell
Voice: Miru
Birthday: August 8th / Blood Type: B / Height: 155 cm / Measurements: B90/W60/H89 / Favorite Food: Tokoroten

A “wild maid” looking for a master to take care of. While a student at Shingo’s academy, she somehow still finds the time to perform various menial maid-themed tasks. Nanatsu is unfailingly cheerful and upbeat—but unfortunately, she can also be pushy and impulsive.


Miu Amaha
Voice: Risa Matsuda
Birthday: February 22nd / Blood Type: O / Height: 146 cm / Measurements: B87/W58/H84 / Favorite Food: Raw Vegetables

A senior one year above Shingo who greets everyone with a tender smile, no matter who they are. Despite her young appearance, she is motherly and caring. She loves animals and always has a strange cat-like being nicknamed Panditty riding on top of her head.
